Source.Name: xfce4-dev-tools
Source.Description: Xfce4-dev-tools contains common tools required by Xfce developers and people that want to build Xfce from SVN. In addition, this package contains the Xfce developer's handbook.

Xfce4-dev-tools paketi, Xfce geliştiricileri ve SVN'den Xfce inşa edecek kullanıcılar için gerekli temel araçları içine alır. Buna ek olarak pakette Xfce geliştiricileri için el kitabı da yer almaktadır.

Update.Comment: * New release: - Fix typo that breaks XDT_FEATURE_LINKER_OPTS.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * New release for new Xfce version: - Also support for new AC_CONFIG_HEADERS macro. - Add XDT_FEATURE_VISIBILITY to check for and enable symbol visibility support (only useful for building libraries). - Add XDT_FEATURE_LINKER_OPTS that checks for and enables useful linker optimizations if supported. This currently only checks for --as-needed and -O1, but more may be added in the future. - Beef up XDT_FEATURE_DEBUG: -- Add new 'minimum' debug level, which is now the default and behaves similarly to the old 'no' default. -- Debug level 'no' disables many glib/gobject-related checks and asserts (this is not really recommended). -- Debug level 'full' disables code optimization. -- The macro now takes an argument to specify the default debug level.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-clipman-plugin
Source.Summary: A clipboard plugin for the Xfce4 panel

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Closes the last must-fix-bugs. - A new clipboard manager written on top of GTK+ functions that take also care about the primary clipboard (the mouse selections). - Fixed a bug where the popup command from a keyboard shortcut wouldn't always bring the menu up.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - New option "Ignore selections" and dropped the option "Exclude from option" that was bound to the "Sync selections". Now it is always possible to keep the selections in the history (as it was the case in older version). - Note about the regex nature in the actions dialog being always anchored.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Settings dialog is an external application xfce4-clipman-settings. Optional support for libunique to make the settings dialog unique. - Switched to GIO for file monitoring support over the actions XML file. Minimum version requirement for glib bumped to 2.16. - The bundle "standalone app/panel plugin" is splitted in two binaries. - The autostart behavior has changed. Now when the standalone application is launched the autostart file is automatically set to true, and when it is dropped by the user it is set to false. - Added the daemon from gnome-settings-daemon, it keeps a copy of all targets and replicates them to the clipboard before it is going empty. - Added groups into ClipmanActions identified by integers where -1 represents all the groups. This makes it possible to retrieve only a set of actions. The Clipman settings dialog has a new checkbox to retrieve actions only on manual copies (e.g. Ctrl+C). - Fixed a bug with KDE where the status icon is getting smaller and smaller. - Updated some translations. * Disable again xml2po parameter. Not necessary. * Add libunique dependency. * Add missing docbook-xsl build dependency.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Drop check on text / html atom. - Do not include GNOME, KDE and LXDE. - Remove inhibit property.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-notes-plugin
Source.Description: xfce4-notes-plugin is a notes panel plugin for the Xfce Desktop Environment. It provides a simple system for managing sticky notes on your desktop.
Xfce4-notes-plugin, Xfce masaüstü ortamı için bir panel eklentisidir. Masaüstünüzdeki yapışkan notları yönetmek için basit bir sistem içerir.

Update.Comment: - Set Notebook tab reorderable via drag and drop - Link to Math lib (-lm) useful for lib/color.c - Try to open a link with exo-open first - Bump GTK+ version to 2.14 - Properly save notes when leaving (handle UNIX TERM and INT signals) - Rework the GTK+ RC theme with custom scrollbars, a shaded title bar and replaced the close button against a self painted widget with Cairo - Align the note name in the title bar on the left near the menu icon - Restore tab orientation when the tab label changes (bug #6246) - Reorganize right click title bar menu and add new item "About" - Renamed sub-menu "Go" into "Groups" (bug #6249) - New right click menu option in panel "Add new group" - Fix undo feature not working after a small delay - Fix sticky window not being restored and reset "keep-above" after hidding - Updated translations: Kazakh, Catalan, Russian, Ukrainian, Hungarian, Galician, Japanese, Czech, French, German, Danish, Basque, Latvian, Slovak, Portuguese
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Update translations. - Unique support has been introduced as a hard-dependency (because you just can't provide soft-dependencies when building from Vala sources) - The plugin is provided both as a panel plugin and as a standalone app that sits in the notification area (a menu item is available under Accessories) - A context menu to go to a specific notes-group appears in the context menu (right click the panel plugin or the systray icon) - Navigation bar can be set on/off in the settings dialog - The tabs can be positioned instead of only on/off - The top-right/left corners are no more resizable - A cursor handle to resize on the right/left is displayed - Some minor esthetic changes - Small bug fixes * Add new dependency: libunique. * Add new path files.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Show tabs option is back in the settings dialog - Deleting the last note also deletes the window (bug #5535) - Rework window default visiblity - Keep order of notes (bug #5534) - Updated translations: Danish, Basque, Urdu, Catalan, Turkish, Japanese, Hungarian, Indonesian, Italian, Asturian, Romanian, Portuguese, Spanish.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: Version bump and added description tags.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-systemload-plugin
Source.Description: Xfce4-systemload-plugin is a plugin which displays the current CPU load, the memory in use, the swap space and the system uptime in the Xfce panel.
Xfce4-systemload-plugin, Xfce panelinde o anki işlemci yükü, bellek ve swap alanı kullanımını gösteren bir eklentidir.

Update.Comment: * Fix dependencies. * Add description. * Add missing docs.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-xkb-plugin
Source.Summary: A plugin to switch keyboard layouts for the Xfce4 panel
Klavye yerleşimini değiştirmek için Xfce4 panel eklentisi
Source.Description: A plugin for the Xfce4 panel displaying keyboard layout. The plugin may be used as an indicator for the current layout and to switch layouts.

xfce4-xkb-plugin ile Xfce4 panelinden klavye yerleşimini bir iki tıklamayla değiştirebilir, uygulama veya pencere içinde de farklı klavye yerleşimi kullanabilirsiniz. Ayrıca klavye geçiş kısayollarını destekler.

Source.Name: xfce4-mpc-plugin
Source.Summary: A simple MPD client for Xfce4 panel
Xfce4 paneli için basit MPD istemcisi
Source.Description: Xfce4-mpc-plugin is a simple Music Player Daemon client to send play, pause, stop or more commands for Xfce4 panel.
Xfce4-mpc-plugin, Xfce4 paneline yerleşen; çalma, durdurma, duraklama gibi komutları istemciye göndermeye yarayan basit bir Müzik Çalar Servisi (MPD) istemcisidir.

Update.Comment:
* Version bump: - This release add user-configurable markups for playlist and tooltip using a gmpc-like markup : playlist accepts %artist%, %title%, %album% and %track%, tooltip accepts the same plus %vol%, %status% and %newline%.
- It also fixes an annoying bug when panel was resized, now button icons are properly resized too.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-wmdock-plugin
Source.Description: WMdock plugin is a compatibility layer for Window Maker dockapps for Xfce.
WMdock eklentisi, Window Maker masaüstü için yazılmış eklentileri Xfce'de kullanmaya yarayan bir panel eklentisidir.

Source.Name: xfce4-diskperf-plugin
Source.Summary: A disk usage and performance panel plugin for Xfce
Source.Description: A disk usage and performance panel plugin for Xfce.
xfce4-diskperf-plugin, disk performansı ve kullanımı hakkında bilgi veren Xfce4 paneli eklentisidir.

Update.Comment: * Fix dependencies. * Remove additional file, not necessary. * Add missing doc file.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: orage
Source.Description: Orage is a time-managing application for the Xfce desktop environment.
Orage, Xfce masaüstü yöneticisi için yapılmış zaman yönetimi uygulamasıdır.

Update.Comment: * Fix configuration parameters. * Fix dependencies. * Rewrite file paths with subdirs.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfwm4
Source.Description: The Xfce4 window manager manages the placement of application windows on the screen, provides beautiful window decorations, manages workspaces or virtual desktops, and natively supports multiscreen mode.

Xfce4 pencere yöneticisi, uygulama pencerelerinin ekrana yerleştirmeyi sağlar, pencerelerin güzel görünmesini sağlar, çalışma alanlarını ve sanal masaüstlerini yönetir ve doğal olarak çoklu ekran kipini destekler.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Build fixes for GIT. - Fix mixed RTL/LTR text not rendering properly in title and tabwin. - Place windows on top of stack even when not focused in focus follow mouse (bug #5479). - Increase menu button height and redice width (bug #5567). - Do not set the "demand attention" flag when the window is already focused. - Keep windows entirely visible on screen change (bug #5795). - Various compilation warnings fixed. - Compute screen size based on each monitor size and layout and avoid using reported size (bug #5795). - Reloading settings on keys-changed signal is a huge overhead and complete nonsense (bug #5964). - Recent Xorg drivers disable the output when the lid is closed, leaving no active monitor, in that case simply ignore the event to avoid messing with windows' positions (bug #6209). - Add linkage to libm when compositor is used (bug #6231). - Check for invalid type for GValue to avoid a crash (bug #6195). - Allow only regular windows to be placed either above or below. - Translation updates (cs, el, es, gl, it, pl, pt, sv, tr, uk, lv, ur, ur_PK, ro, ru, nl, ug).
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Fix dependencies. * Fix configuration parameters. * Rewrite file paths with subdirs.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: Version bump, fix deps and package takeover.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-panel
Source.Description: The Xfce4 panel supports multiple panels, with many options for their position, appearance, transparency and behavior. There are many items available by default to full fit a panel, like application launchers with detachable menus, a graphical pager, a tasklist, a clock, a system tray, a show / hide desktop switcher, and even more. It offers an easy way to add items using a dialog, and to move items accross different panels.

Xfce4 paneli, farklı pozisyon, görünüm ve davranış gibi ayarlara sahip birden fazla paneli destekleyebilmektedir. Uygulama başlatıcı tipinde ayrılabilir menüler, grafiksel sayfalayıcı, görev çubuğu, saat, sistem çekmecesi, masaüstünü gizleme / görüntüleme ve bir panelde olabilecek birçok şeyi içinde barındırır. Ayrıca, diyalog penceresi kullanarak kolayca panel öğesi eklemeye ve panelden panele öğe taşımaya izin verir.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Destroy windowlist menu in an idle (bug #3853). - Link directly to libm (bug #6233). - Allow compilation with exo-1 too. - Translation updates (ru, ta, pr_BR, hu, gl, fi, it, si, uk, id, ug). * Add missing license information. * Use xdt-autogen. * Remove unrequired patch.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Update translations. - Drop pot file. - Don't use g_object_set in the init function (bug #6110).
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Properly set orientation of tasklist handler. - Fix launcher with "Run in Terminal" - Fix typo preventing build on older gtk versions. - Don't send -r to session restart command. - Get the time the same as orange does, hopefully should fix bug #5352. - Better check for the lcd resize when the number of hour digits changes. - Remove the hour interval from the clock, minutes are good enough. - Update translations.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Remove panel config files. They're already in pardus-default-settings-xfce.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Fix dependencies. * Fix undefined references. * Purge unused direct dependencies.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: Version bump, merge customization files from xfdesktop and package takeover.

Source.Name: xfce4-session
Source.Description: The session manager allows the user to save sessions and restore them after login. It is capable of saving several different sessions. It comes with three splash screen engines. And at last it helps you to log out, reboot, and shutdown the system.

Xfce oturum yöneticisi, kullanıcıların oturumlarını kaydetmesine ve giriş yaptıktan sonra tekrar oturumu çağırmalarına izin verir. Birden fazla, farklı oturumları kaydetmede oldukça başarılıdır. Pakette üç tane örnek açılış teması var ve son olarak, sistemi kapatırken, yeniden başlatırken veya çıkarken kullanıcılara yardımcı olur.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Build fixes for GIT. - Add timing information to verbose output. - If it looks like the helper got killed, just return success (bug #4849). - Translation updates (de, es, gl, hu, id, pl, pt, ru, tr, uk, ro, lv, ur, ur_PK, ast, sk, nl, it, kk). * xfce4-dev-tools dependency added for reconfigure package.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Remove default splash theme patch. * Move xfce4-session.xml file to pardus-default-settings-xfce package.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Enable gnome-keyring support. * Fix dependencies. * Split package.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Fix undefined symbols. * Purge unused direct deps. * Fix package dependencies. * Fix configure parameters.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: Added patch for setting default splash theme.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: Add menu icon for autostarted application.
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Source.Name: exo
Source.Description: exo is an extension library to Xfce, developed by os-cillation. While Xfce comes with quite a few libraries that are targeted at desktop development, exo is targeted at application development.
exo, os-cillation tarafından geliştirilen Xfce eklenti kitaplığıdır. Xfce masaüstü ortamını hedefleyen az kitaplıkla gelirken, exo uygulama geliştirmeyi hedefliyor.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Make the treeview work again with gtk 2.20 (bug #6230). - Fix compilation error (bug #6421). - Build ChangeLog from GIT. - Translation updates (pt, nl, it, am, bn, kk, ug, ru, ja). * Remove unrequired COPYING file. * Add LGPLv2 license. * Add xfce4-dev-tools dependency. * Update patches.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Initial Norwegian Nynorsk translation. - Slovak translation. - Post-release tag bump. - Only sync devices with no volume. - Updates for 0.3.106 release.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Post release tag bump. - Read mount options from a rc file (bug #2891). - Version the API docs. - Fix notes when generating the man pages. - Merge stable back into xfce-4.6. * Remove unrequired patch.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Fix an annoying bug that prevented Thunar from ejecting a cd by clicking on the device's button. - Make unmount work for devices that have a parent that is a volume. - Fix typo in exo-open man page. - Rebuild .po files. * Remove unrequired patch.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. - Update translations. - Fix some small compiler warnings. - Open trash:// uris with the file manager. - Also drop the r in the revision. - Drop INSTALL since it's generated at build time. - Make mounting NTFS drives work in exo-mount. - Add support for iocharset in exo-mount. - Use the update-preview signal for updating the preview.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. - Allow all arguments in the terminal parameters. - Fix some issues in exo-open with spaces in arguments. - Properly handle NULL pixbufs in the toolbars code. - Make sure the ui-manager is up2date when creating the exo toolbar. - Fix possible segfault in exo_icon_view_get_item_at_pos. - Do not escape commas in urls. - Lookup the hardcoded paths for (u)mount during configure. - Fix missing include for strftime. - Prefer getvfsstat over getfsstat. - Don't abort if python is not found. * Rewrite description.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Split package. * Enable gtk-doc. * Add PartOf and IsA tag for devel package.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Fixed undefined references. * Purged unused direct dependencies (ldd output).
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Stable version bump. * Moved documents to new binary package.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-notifyd
Source.Summary: Xfce için basit DBUS mesajlarını görüntüleme aracı
Source.Description: The Xfce Notify Daemon (xfce4-notifyd for short) is a smallish program that implements the "server-side" portion of the Freedesktop desktop notifications specification. Applications that wish to pop up a notification bubble ina standard way can implicitly make use of xfce4-notifyd to do so by sending standard messages over D-Bus using the org.freedesktop. Notifications interface.
Xfce Notify Daemon, DBUS mesajlarını org.freedesktop.Notifications kullanarak ekrana açılır pencere olarak bildirir.

Source.Name: squeeze
Source.Description: Squeeze is a modern and advanced archive manager for the Xfce Desktop Environments. Its design adheres to the Xfce philosophy, which basically means Squeeze is both fast and easy to use.
Squeeze, Xfce masaüstü ortamı için yazılmış ve onun felsefesine göre arayüzü basit ve sade olarak tasarlanmış modern ve gelişmiş bir arşiv yöneticisidir.

Update.Comment: * Cut down patches' names. * Fix dependencies.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Fix dependencies. * Add patches for cosmetic errors. * Fix indents (pspec.xml). * Purge unused direct deps.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfburn
Source.Summary: A simple CD/DVD burning tool for Xfce
Xfce için basit CD/DVD yazma aracı
Source.Description: Xfburn is a simple CD/DVD burning tool based on libburnia libraries. It can blank CD-RWs, burn and create iso images, as well as burn personal compositions of data to either CD or DVD.

Xfburn, libburnia kütüphanelerini kullanan basit bir CD/DVD yazma aracıdır. Yeniden yazılabilir CD'leri silebilir, yazabilir ve iso kalıpları oluşturabilir. Ayrıca hem CD, hem DVD verilerini kullanarak yeni bir kalıp da oluşturabilmektedir.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Fix a number of bugs, mainly for audio CD, drag and drop, and file browser issues. - Some internals were rewritten to restore the balance of all things. - Update translations. * Remove translation patch, not necessary. * Fix dependencies for lddtree.sh output.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Fix turkish translation. * Remove unnecessary build deps.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: - Version bump, - Add gstreamer dependency, - No needs to desktop.patch, it's translated now.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfwm4-themes
Source.Description: Xfce4-themes is a set of additional themes for the Xfwm window manager.
Bu paket, Xfce masaüstü yönetici pencereleri için ek temalar içerir.

Source.Name: ristretto
Source.Description: Ristretto is a fast and lightweight picture-viewer for the Xfce desktop environment.
Ristretto, Xfce için hızlı ve hafif bir resim görüntüleme uygulamasıdır.

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Fix dependencies. * Enable Xfce desktop support.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfdesktop
Source.Description: The desktop manager sets the background image, provides a right-click menu to launch applications and can optionally show files (including application launchers) or iconified windows. It includes gradient support for background color, saturation support for background image, real multiscreen and xinerama support, and it provides a desktop menu editor.

Xfce masaüstü yöneticisi arkaplan resmini belirler, uygulamaları başlatmak, simge durumuna küçültülmüş pencereleri veya dosya seçeneklerini göstermek için sağ tık menüsünü hazırlar. Arkaplan rengi için gradyan desteği, arkaplan resmi için doygunluk desteği, gerçek çoklu ekran ve xinerama desteği içerir. Ayrıca, masaüstü menü düzenleme aracını da bünyesinde barındırır.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Build fixes for GIT. - Rebuild doc directory. - Add libexo to CFLAGS and LIBS for panel plugin. - Fix detection of rename/delete ability. - Fix compilation when libexo isn't present. - Update icon text labels when system font size changes (bug #2862). - Set mnemonic widget properly for icon type/size labels (bug #5555). - Always show 'Eject' in volume context menus, regardless of whether or not it's mounted (bug #5343). - Never show 'Unmount' in volume context menus. - Use GtkBindingSet for keyboard handling on desktop. - Only register menu with panel if popup succeeded (bug #5792). - Fix inability to delete broken symlinks on the desktop (bug 5387). - Don't misuse the g_return_(val_)?if_fail() macros as much (bug #5791). - Translation updates (el, es, gl, it, pl, pt, ru, tr, ro, lv, ca, ur, ur_PK, hu, ast, da, sk, nn, nl, si, am, kk, ja, ug, fr). * Remove unrequired patch. * Remove COPYING file.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Cut down patch name. * Fix dependencies. * Remove unused additional file. * Rewrite file paths with subdirs.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Description: Xfce4-settings is a configuration manager for Xfce desktop environment.

Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Avoid causing xfce4-session to time out on startup (bug #5040). - Fix type in xfconf property name (debian bug #527238). - Fix mnemonic widgets in accessibility dialog (bug #5550). - Fix translation macros in settings helper (bug #5554). - Always restore the default displa scheme on startup (bug #5311). - Make sure --verbose is simmilar to --debug instead of --version - Fix compile-issue with libxklavier >= 4 * Remove typo-fix patch. It's included to this version.

Source.Name: Terminal
Source.Description: Terminal is a modern, lightweight, and low memory cost terminal emulator with tabs and multiple windows for the Xfce desktop environment. It offers full-customization for the key bindings, the aspect, the colors, and more.

Terminal çağdaş, hafif ve az bellek harcayan; sekmeli ve çoklu pencereyi destekleyen, Xfce masaüstü ortamı için yazılmış bir uçbirim öykünücüsüdür. Renkler, görünüm, kısayol tuşları ve daha fazlası için kişiselleştirmeye izin verir.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Improve support for --program-transform-name. - Don't set the locale twice on a normal startup. - Only install the symlink if the Terminal command exists. - Don't set translation domain when libxfce4util is new enough. - Use utilities-terminal for the icon name. - Add question dialog to view online manual. - Abort when compiling with --enable-gen-doc with missing deps. - Disconnect bindings before closing the dialog. - Improve handling shells (bug #6368). - Translation updates (hu, fr, de, da, pt, ca, ru, it, fi, si, kk, cs, uk, zh_CN, es, lv, ja, gl, hr, sk, ug).
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Add missing toolbar tooltips. - Remove deprecated encoding entry and add to GTK category. - Initial man page for terminal. - Remove usage help from executable. - Move the environment and files sections to the man page. - Post-release version bump. - Use PACKAGE_NAME instead of PACKAGE_STRING. - Restore Benny's affiliation info. - Create xref for geometry in manual. - Some warnings in the XML. - Print options summary instead of opening the man page. - Add comments for the translatable parameters. - Merge branch 'nick/man' - Use OPTION.... in man page like in the --help message. - Fix typo spotted by Harald Servat. - Remove some unused functions and make some static. - Remove pot file. - Update copyrights. - Fix errors in manual translations. - Use the correct version in the man-page. - Fix typo in README. - Update translations: ru, id, sv, el, ca, es, en_GB, gl, ja, cs, nl, pt, pt_BR, da, eu, lv, sk, fr, zh_CN, it.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Fix invalid XML in ca and ja doc translations - Make sure we list in the correct directory - Updates to Italian (it) translation - Improve the D-Bus code a bit - Fix double unref in dbus code
Update.Name: Cihan Okyay

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Update translations. - Fix broken background image when compositing is disabled. - Use new xdt-autogen macros.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Update translations and documents. - Don't die on dbus exit. - Get rid of more pointless tabs. - Remove needed check, n_pages can never be 0 here. - Add module description file. - Update module file. - Use the initial title if the dynamic title is set to hidden in tabs too. - Use gtk_show_uri and new dialog hook and new version of exo. - Disable mnemonics in GtkSettings (bug #5714).
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Stable version bump: - Don't show the set title dialog when double-clicking on the scrollbar. - Don't build the menubar when not enabled on startup. - Various small code cleanups. - Translation updates (cs, eu, ja, kk). * Update homepage url.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. - Do not save properties that are the same as the default value (and not hidden) in the rc file. This makes startup a bit faster. - Remove vte-title-workaround and show the vte title in the go menu (so without the initial title). - Documentation updates.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Use environ variables provided by GLib for better compatibility. - Use new VTE api. - Don't set contents change on window resize (Xfce bug #5443). - Fix segfault in special tab configuration (Xfce bug #3809). - Monitor config files using GIO to avoid polling for file changes (Xfce bug #3567). - Check for case problems when creating the symlink (Xfce bug #4431). - Add hidden option to disable middle-click tab close (Xfce bug #4403). - Property handle the button accelerators in the compose dialog (Xfce bug #5288). - Convert the preferences dialog into GtkBuilder (Xfce bug #2399, #2875, #5496). - Use stock icons and remove unused icons (Xfce bug #5495). - Allow editing of shortcuts from the menu (Xfce bug #4246). - Make the tab close button smaller. - Fix compilation problems on Solaris (Xfce bug #4581). - Update fullscreen action if changed by the wm (Xfce bug #5155). - Add commandline option to set the window icon (Xfce bug #5480). - Refactor the usage help so it's easier to understand. Also add the --maximize option. - Allow '-character in links (Xfce bug #4465). - Add hidden option for the cursor shape (Xfce bug #4602). - Convert preferences dialog in Gtkbuilder and make it fit better inside Xfce using the titled dialog. - Fix compiler warnings, code cleanups and improvements. - Support for the erase tty key binding, requires vte 0.20.4 (Xfce bug #2925). - A lot of updated translations. * Fix runtime dependencies for lddtree.sh output. * Remove patches. Not necessary.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Libxfcegui4, Xfce masaüstü yöneticisi için tasarlanmış farklı GTK+ parçacıkları kütüphanesidir.

Source.Name: midori
Source.Summary: A lightweight web browser that is based GTK+
Source.Description: Midori is a lightweight GTK+ web browser based on WebkitGtk. It features tabs, windows and session management, bookmarks stored with XBEL, searchbox based on OpenSearch, and user script support.

Midori, WebkitGtk tarayıcı motorunu kullanan, hafif bir GTK+ tabanlı internet tarayıcısıdır. Birçok internet tarayıcısında olduğu gibi, Midori de sekmeleri, pencereleri ve oturum yöneticisini; XBEL ile sık kullanılanları kaydetmeyi, OpenSearch tabanlı arama kutusunu ve kullanıcı betiklerini kullanma gibi özellikleri desteklemektedir.

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Enable vala support. * Remove unused arguments.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Bookmarks can be imported from Opera, Arora, Kazehakase, Epiphany and other browser using XBEL. The XBEL support was improved in terms of performance and compatibility with other applications. - Colourful Tabs now work in combination with the Tab Panel. Delete Private data includes Web Cache which it didn't before. And if you have a small screen or mobile device, Open panels in separate windows can be useful. Correct ordering of History and Trash were fixed. The Shortcuts dialogue display issues were fixed. - The options 'Show in toolbar' and 'Open as web app' were implemented for bookmarks. So you can selectively decide what bookmarks or folders to have in the bookmarkbar. And if you mark them as 'web app' bookmarks open in a separate process. - Several improvements related to portability and compatibility were applied, for Hildon and Win32. Build fixes for certain Glib and GTK+ versions were applied. libnotify is now a build-time dependency.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Mouse gestures are fixed, linking with gold is supported, the navigation toolbar is hidden in fullscreen and the preference dialogue was tweaked a little. - You may notice that opening of new windows is incredibly fast and startup of Midori is faster. - Hotkeys involving Tab or single characters are supported now. - Terminating Midori with Unix signals won't trigger the crash dialogue anymore (a real crash will). - We have a Web Cache extension and a Tab History list now, both incredibly nice additions. Also form history was improved, it works with forms where it didn't before and saves values to disk so it works after closing Midori in-between.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - (Kinetic) drag scrolling on touchscreen devices. - Workaround a speed dial crasher. - Faster Adblock with element blocking, for all WebKitGTK+ versions. - Stripped menu, toolbar and tap on hold on Maemo, and 5.0 menu support. - Add a DNS prefetching extension. - Better IDN handling. - Add a form history extension. - Restore scrolling positions from the session. - Keep typed address when switching tabs. - Avoid storing duplicate history items per day. - Fix multiple duplicate HTTP authentication dialogs. - Pass mailto: links to the email client. - Improve context menu with WebKitGTK+ 1.1.15. - Checkbox "Remember password" in HTTP authentication. - Fix a crasher when modifying bookmarks. - Support page icons other than favicon.ico. - iPhone identity in Network preferences.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Update brings great things like saving HTTP logins. - Much better address completion. - Fixed nes feed icon, improvements of the feed panel extension. - Update of the tab panel extension. - There's Undo / Redo support with WebKitGTK+ now. - A revamped Adblock extension that loads adblock plus / easylist files, and unlike the previous version actually works wonderfully. - And last but not least the freezing is fixed that could occur when opening multiple windows.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Remove the very much disliked popup below the address field. - Fix user scripts, user styles and the Netscape plugin panel. - Improve the tab panel. It has close icons now, ellipsizes titles, tooltips and you can hide the panel operating controls now to make it really space efficient. - Show up tools in the compact menu button now. - If you like to keep open certain tabs, now you can minimize them, whic means reducing them to icons - support for this in the tab panel will follow in a future version. - There's a new tick mark in a dialogue in Tools > Delete private data, that tells Midori to delete the chosen information when quitting. - A nice goodie is that navigation history is preserved in newly opened tabs now. * Change default homepage; use pardus.org.tr instead of ozgurlukicin.com.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Update Turkish translation. * Fix dependencies for lddtree.sh output.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-mixer
Source.Description: Xfce4-mixer is a volume control application for the Xfce Desktop Environment. It provides both a volume control plugin for the Xfce Panel and a standalone mixer application. It supports all audio systems supported by GStreamer project.

Xfce4-mixer, Xfce Masaüstü Ortamı için yazılmış bir ses ayar uygulamasıdır. Hem panel eklentisi olarak, hem de kendi penceresinde bağımsız olarak kullanılabilen bir uygulamadır. GStreamer projesinin desteklediği tüm ses sistemlerini destekler.

Update.Comment: * Fix dependencies. * Rewrite file paths with subdirs. * Remove default configuration parameters.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Fix dependencies. * Add description tag. * Add patch to set volume to 100% instead of 90%.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: Fixed volume border, added new configure parameters.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: xfce4-volumed
Source.Description: This daemon is responsible of making the volume up / down and mute keys of the keyboard work automatically, and uses the Xfce 4 mixer's card setting for chosing which card to act on. It also provides volume change / mute toggle notifications if the notification server used supports x-canonical-icon-only and x-canonical-synchronous notifications.

xfce4-volumed, klavyedeki ses artırma / azaltma ve kapama tuşları otomatik olarak kullanabilmenizi sağlar. Hangi ses kartı ile çalışılacağının belirlenmesi için Xfce4 ses karıştırıcısının ses kartı ayarı kullanılır. Aynı zamanda uyarı servisi çalışıyorsa, yapılan ses ayarlarını ekranda bildirir.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Use xfce4-dev-tools. - Now show the actual current volume with a mute icon when muting the v$. - Make sure the desktop file uses the correct prefix for its Exec value. - Fix a bug with sound cards without device names. - Use the low volume icon when volume is 0%, instead of the muted one. - Prevent a crash if there is no XF86Volume key on the system.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. - now uses XDG-compliant icon names. - improved compatibility with xfce4-notifyd. - debug mode now tells when a key is pressed.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Support for asynchronous libnotify daemons. - Move support for legacy libxcb-keysyms to the main branch with a build toggle.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Description: Xfce4-appfinder is a useful software that permits you to find every application in the system supporting desktop entry format.
Xfce4-appfinder, kullanıcının sisteminde yüklü, masastünde doğrudan çalışabilen her uygulamayı bulmasını sağlayan, kullanışlı bir uygulama bulucudur.

Source.Name: xfce4-power-manager
Source.Summary: A power manager dedicated for Xfce desktop environment
Source.Description: This software is a power manager for the Xfce desktop, laptop users can set up a power profile for two different modes “on battery power” and “on ac power”, desktop users still can change DPMS settings and CPU frequency using the settings dialog.

Bu yazılım, Xfce için yazılmış güç yöneticisidir. Dizüstü bilgisayar kullanıcıları, pil ve güç olarak iki farklı güç profili ayarlayabilir; masaüstü bilgisayar kullanıcıları ise, DPMS ayarlarını kullanarak işlemci frekansını yazılımın ana penceresinden değiştirebilirler.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Fix inactivity check box not appearing on esktop system. - Fix adapter icon when no battery present. - Replace XfpmIdle with EggIdletime from gpm. - Reset XScreen saver counter on lid open.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. - Because on some systems we might not have the brightness keys mapped. LCD brightness change are not reflected to xfpm when keys are pressed, so save the actual brightness before dimming the screen on idle to restore it afterword. - Check if DPMS is enabled before doing action on lid close event. - Allow 1% as a minimum critical charge level. - Build fix with xextproto > 7.0.5.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Missing signal handler for power button settings. - Allow 5% as a minimum critical change instead of 10%. - Change some property names, specially for buttons to avoid problems with old 0.6 configuration. * Remove unrequired dependency. * Fix dependencies for lddtree.sh output.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Provides more standard org.fd.PowerManagement DBus methods and signal. - Make it possible to compile without network manager support. - Add never show icon to the system tray configuration. - Fix a typo that prevents from getting the correct critical configuration. - Use GTK+ as a popup indicator to show the brightness level as the cairo. - Problematic on some hardware. - Better alignment in the interface file.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. - Fix a bug affecting 0.8.1.* (not 0.8.0) for the properties prefix. - Automatically switch inactivity sleep mode to hibernate if suspend is not supported. - Allow 15 minutes as a minimum value for idle. - Fix regression for detecting when HAL restarts. - Automatically detect if the running Notification daemon is notify-osd and use its brightness feedback interface for displaying the brightness level. * Disable xml2po, it's not required.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Remove libglade dependency and use GtkBuilder instead. - Add lock screen option on lid event. - Use generic value for storing and retrieving configuration instead of individual variables. - Don't allow brightness timeout to be less than DPMS sleep timeout. - Change the brightness popup indicator style. - Translation updates. * Remove unnecessary buildtime dependencies.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Fix dependencies. * Enable xsltproc and xml2po.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Description: Thunar has been designed from the ground up to be fast and easy-to-use. Its user interface is clean and intuitive, and does not include any confusing or useless options. Thunar is fast and responsive with a good start up time and directory load time. Thunar is accessible using Assistive Technologies and is fully standarts compliant.

Thunar, baştan başa hızlı olmak ve kolay kullanım için tasarlanmıştır. Kullanıcı arayüzü temiz ve çabuk anlaşılabilir; diğer taraftan karışık ve kullanışsız hiçbir seçenek içermiyor. Thunar açılırken ve dizin çağırırken hızlıdır. Ayrıca Thunar'a yardımcı teknolojilerle de erişilebilir ve standartlara tam uyumludur.

auCDtect, ses dosyalarının tayf karakteristiklerini inceleyen ve hangi kodçözler (codec) kullanılarak sıkıştırıldığını belirleyen bir konsol aracıdır. Bir müzik CD'sinin MP3 dosyalarından mı yoksa orjinal kaynağından mı oluşturulduğunu kontrol etmek için yararlıdır. Testler auCDtect'in %95'ten yüksek bir doğruluk oranına sahip olduğunu gösteriyor.

Source.Name: synfig

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Migration to git repository. * Improved messages for failed open file commands. * Fixed crash when unsetting import layer filename after using PNG or JPEG importers. * Improved the rendering of curve gradient layers near vertices with 0-length tangents. * Fixed previous bug that produced bad render to the star layer. * Enabled use of ffmpeg importer. * Set four modules as essential: gradient, geometry, particle, freetype. * Improved message when initialize synfig fails. * New environment variables for options. * Added support for alpha in paletted PNG files. * New option: Scale New imported Images to Fit Canvas. * Better errors when attempting to open a file that doesn't exist. * Enabled Example module: Metaballs, Simple Circle, Filled Rectangle. * Enabled Example module: Metaballs, Simple Circle, Filled Rectangle. * Added 'Loop' parameter to the Random Value Node. * Updated translations. * Changed dependency name. (libxmlpp2) * Fixed sandbox problems. * Purged unused direct dependencies * Take over.
Update.Name: Cihan Okyay

Rawstudio, RAW dosyalarını PNG, JPG, TIF dosyalarını dönüştürmenize ve arkadaşlarınızla veya isteyenlerle bu dosyaları paylaşılabilir biçime getirmeye yarayan uygulamadır.

Source.Description: With Fotoxx you can edit image files from a digital camera. Includes color and contrast enhancement, red-eye removal, sharpen, crop, rotate, noise removal, HDR (high dynamic range) and panorama image compositing, thumbnail image browser, tag editing and search.

Fotoxx ile herhangi bir dijital kameradan aldığınız resim dosyalarını düzenleyebilirsiniz. Renk ve kontrast geliştirmeleri, kırmızı göz efekti (red-eye effect) giderme, keskinleştirme, kırpma, çevirme, gürültü giderme (noise removal), HDR ve panoramik fotoğrafların birleştirilmesi, etiket düzenleme ve arama gibi pek çok özelliğe sahiptir.

Source.Name: comix
Source.Summary: A GTK+ handle comic books image viewer
Source.Description: Comix is a user-friendly, customizable image viewer. It is specifically designed to handle comic books, but also serves as a generic viewer. It reads images in ZIP, RAR or tar archives (also gzip or bzip2 compressed) as well as plain images files. It is written in Python and uses GTK+ through the PyGTK bindings.

Comix kullanıcı dostu, özelleştirilebilir resim görüntüleyicisidir. Özellikle çizgi romanları görüntülemek için tasarlanmıştır; ama genel resim görüntüleyici olarak da kullanılabilir. Doğrudan resimleri açmanın yanında, ZIP, RAR veya tar arşivleri (bzip2 ya da gzip biçiminde sıkıştırılmış olanlar da dahil) içindeki resimleri de okuyabilir. Python'da yazılıp arayüzü PyGTK ile tasarlanmıştır.

Update.Comment: * Version bump - When drawing diagonally while adding wires, an "L" shape is formed, so two wires are added instead of just one. - When zooming far out, the grid becomes dense and very dark. - On some platforms, the canvas would gray out when a component was selected for addition, and it would not clear except for the component's location until the component was inserted. - In zooming in or out, the scroll bars were not recomputed based on the new zoom distance. - In zooming in or out, the location within the canvas would be lost. - A new package (com.cburch.logisim.instance) provides an API that dramatically simplifies the development of JAR libraries. The built-in Arithmetic, Plexers, Memory, and I/O libraries have been refactored to use it. - Added the capacity to export PNG and JPEG files in addition to GIFs. The menu option Export As GIF... is renamed to Export Image - When a circuit is removed from the project while a tool for adding subcircuits is selected, a different tool is selected. - Removed unneeded patch. (macos.patch)
Update.Name: Cihan Okyay

Source.Name: merkaartor
Source.Description: This is a Qt4-based editor for the OpenStreetMap with features such as map view near-WYSIWYG, style editor, transparent display of map features, support for handling seperate highways, import NMEA-files, etc.

Açık Sokak Haritası (OpenStreetMap) için bir Qt4 tabanlı harita düzenleyicisi olan Merkaartor'un stil düzenleyici, harita özelliklerinin saydam gösterilmesi, bağımsız otoyol desteği, NMEA dosyalarının içe aktarılmabilesi, WYSIWYG tarzı düzenleme gibi birçok özelliği bulunuyor.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Virtual nodes allow fast creation of intermediary nodes * Allow to move node in Node creation mode * Only generate log files on request (--log) on release builds * Re-added tiled Yahoo! imagery as a plugin * NearMap Austalian TMS to the default list * Allow all platforms to connect to a gpsd backend * Support for OSM short link as input * Show distance measurement during area creation * Add language to changeset created_by * Add GlobeXplorer (DigitalGlobe) to default WMS list * Make the point where nodes are not displayed configurable * Keep directional arrows blue for oneway roads in "Show directional arrows - Always" mode. * GeoTIFF background plugin * Grabbing hand icon in single mouse mode * When in "single mouse button" mode, allow to cancel most operation with a right-click * "Zoom lock" mode. Zoom steps are locked to TMS ones and projection is locked to Mercator * Add a preference disallowing selection of relations when hidden * Various bugfixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update tarball sha1sum (includes non-trivial fix), add translations.xml, remove optional dependency, add qt-webkit dependency since it's a seperate package now.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Switch to API 0.6, remove support for API 0.5 * Add a Features dock displaying the features in the current viewport * Alternative way of drawing GPX tracks * Support for proxy authentication * Ability to create a junction between to crossing roads, polygons of any number of sides, house numbers "Karlsruhe" style * Ability to rotate roads/areas * Spatial indexing of features for faster display with large downloaded areas * Support for multiple image layers * Support for multi-selection of layers; allow to show/hide or readonly several layers at once * Drag and drop re-ordering of layers * Plugin-based background layers * Ability to choose Qt style * Discardable dialog/messageboxes * Fixed a bugging graphical corruption on Intel chipsets when the "Show downloaded area" was selected. * Fixed problem with "center" + "center and zoom" from the properties dock. * Fixed nodes fetched by relations are incomplete and not completed by "download more". * Other minor tweaks and bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path and remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Fix in Name property inspector causes AV * Remove English language warning * Proper handling of the "Don't connect GPX nodes..." preference when set to 0. * Fit the style editor in 1024x600 resolution * Reflect in dirty dock the fact that multiple objects were changed together * Added threaded browser-based background image grabbing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Support for KML import * Support for ESRI Shapefile import (albeit not enough tested ;-) * A new background image layer with a basic SHP map of the world * Improved Geotagging pictures support * A "Style" dock * Readonly layers * A native SVG renderer to export your custom maps * A custom QT style * A "one-mouse-button" interaction preference * Many other features and bugfixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: osh
Source.Summary: Object Shell Environment for command choreography
Source.Description: Osh is not a shell. It is an executable implementing a language that supports the composition of commands through piping. The objects piped from one command to the next can be Python primitives (numbers, lists, maps, etc.), other useful types such as dates/times, or database rows; or represent various OS resources such as files, directories, and processes. Conversions between objects and strings simplify integration with the Unix environment. The commands included with osh manipulate objects, access databases, and execute commands remotely, including parallel execution on nodes in a cluster. In a single osh invocation, all commands run in a single process. Multithreading is used only when executing commands on a cluster.

Source.Summary: Küçük ama güçlü bir Sqlite3 yöneticisi
Source.Description: The best developer's and/or admin's GUI tool for Sqlite3 in the world. No joking here (or just a bit only) - it contains the most complete feature set of all tools available.
Bu araç geliştirici ve yöneticiler için dünyadaki en iyi Sqlite3 arayüzüdür. Varolan bütün araçları bir araya getirir.

Source.Name: sqlitebrowser
Source.Description: SQLite Database Browser is a freeware, public domain, open source visual tool used to create, design and edit database files compatible with SQLite. It is meant to be used for users and developers that want to create databases, edit and search data using a familiar spreadsheet-like interface, without the need to learn complicated SQL commands.
SQLite veritabanı düzenleyici, kullanıcıların ve geliştiricilerinin SQL komutlarıyla uğraşmadan, basit bir tablo arayüzü kullanarak, kolayca veritabanı oluşturmasını ve düzenlemesini sağlar.

Source.Summary: MySQL GUI Tools Common Library and Data
MySQL Grafik Arayüz Araçları Ortak Kütüphane ve Verileri

MySQL çok yönlü bir görsel veritabanı araç seti sunuyor. Bu paket, tüm MySQL grafik arayüz araçları tarafından ortak kullanılan kütüphane ve verileri içeriyor.

Source.Name: mysql-administrator
Source.Summary: MySQL Server Administration Graphical User Interface
Source.Description: MySQL Administrator is a powerful visual administration tool that makes it easy to administer and monitor your MySQL environment and gain significantly better visibility into how your databases are operating. MySQL Administrator integrates database management and maintenance into a single, seamless environment, with a clear and intuitive graphical user interface.

MySQL Administrator güçlü bir görsel yönetim aracıdır. MySQL ortamınızı kolayca yönetmenizi ve gözlemlemenizi, veritabanlarınızın nasıl işlediğini daha iyi görmenizi sağlar. MySQL Administrator, veritabanı yönetimi ve bakımını tek bir arayüzde entegre ediyor.

Source.Name: mysql-query-browser
Source.Description: MySQL Query Browser is the easiest visual tool for creating, executing, and optimizing SQL queries for your MySQL Database Server. The MySQL Query Browser gives you a complete set of drag-and-drop tools to visually build, analyze and manage your queries.

MySQL Query Browser, MySQL veritabanı sunucunuz için SQL sorgusu oluşturma, yapma ve optimize etmek için görsel bir araçtır. Sorgularınızı sürükle-bırak yöntemiyle oluşturabilir, analiz edebilir ve yönetebilirsiniz.

cpulimit, bir işlem parçacığının işlemci kullanımını verilen yüzde oranında kısıtlar. Bu sayede yüksek işlemci gücü gerektiren işlemlerin sizi engellemesinden kurtulmuş olursunuz. Bu işlem, iyilik değeri veya öncelikle oynayarak değil, gerçek işlemci kullanımı üzerinden gerçekleştirilir.

Update.Name: Necdet Yücel

Source.Name: tosla
Source.Summary: PC clone of traffic rush game
Source.Description: Tosla is a amusing game that you try to keeping the traffic flowing on a busy junction and preventing crashes. You can speed vehicles to the other side by clicking them with your mouse. Also you can make them stop by right clicking on them. For every vehicle that makes it to the other side, you score a point. If there's a crash, the game ends.

Tosla kalabalık bir kavşakta trafiği düzenleyerek kazaları engellemeye çalıştığınız eğlenceli bir oyundur. Araçları fareyle tıklayarak hızlandırabilir ve karşıya hiç bir araca çarpmadan geçmesini sağlayabilirsiniz. Ayrıca araçları sağ tıklayarak durdurabilirsiniz de. Karşı tarafa geçen her araç için bir puan alırsınız ve eğer bir kaza olursa oyun biter.

Source.Name: openttd
Source.Summary: Reimplementation of Transport Tycoon Deluxe with enhancements
Transport Tycoon Deluxe oyununun geliştirilmiş bir taklidi
Source.Description: A reimplementation of the Microprose game "Transport Tycoon Deluxe" with lots of new features and enhancements. One of its biggest feature is being able to play over internet with other players on its servers. You need original TTD data files in order to run OpenTTD. Look at the README file for details.

Microprose'nin ürettiği "Transport Tycoon Deluxe" oyununun birçok yeniliklerle birlikte geliştirilmiş taklidi. En büyük yeniliklerden biri, internet üzerindeki sunucularda diğer oyuncularla birlikte aynı harita üzerinde oynayabilme özelliğidir. Oyunu çalıştırabilmeniz için özgün TTD veri dosyalarına ihtiyaç vardır. Oyunun sitesinden ve forumundan yardım alabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: Version bump for many important fixes.
Update.Name: Uğur Çetin

Source.Name: hedgewars
Source.Description: Hedgewars is a turn based strategy game but the real buzz is from watching the devastation caused by those pesky hedgehogs with those fantastic weapons - sneaky little blighters with a bad attitude!.
Hedgewars, tur tabanlı bir strateji oyunu ama işin esas eğlencesi o sinir bozucu kirpilerin ellerindeki çeşit çeşit silahlarla yarattıkları yıkımı izlemekte.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Many new hats, hats visible while using rope and blowtorch * New weapons: Exploding barrels, birdy weapon, poisoning effect, dud mines, * Alt weapon preview on rope, parachute * UFO changed to homing bee * AI uses new weapons, aware of fire, can fight in artillery mode * New options in ammo editing - crate probability, delays * Option of semi-opaque hog name tags to avoid fail when land is hidden by name * New sounds: British voicepack, walk sound for hedgehogs, additional bounce sounds * Notification sound when people join your room * Hogs react to throwing grenades / dynamite and when near them * New visual effects: dust on fall impact, smoke, shotgun shells, blink team name on start of turn, hogs pulling weapons out, falling flakes kicked by explosion and more * View ammo menu when not your turn * Contextual help when using weapons menu * 3D effect for waves * Fade effect when starting/stopping game * New game modes - place hedgehog, king mode, randomise starts, allies share ammo, disable girders * Shift + direction to turn without moving * New font for CJK text and better CJK detection * Team flags * Graphic of crate contents when picking up weapon/utility * Splashes/droplets when things fall in the water * 45 degree bounce when throwing grenades * Information on game rules when starting game * Knockball map (scripted map) * Maze generator for new random maps * new crazy map template * New olympics, desert themes, visual updates to many other themes * Background texture for land for a 3d effect on explosions * Frontend able to delete teams * Ignore/friends lists in frontend * Updated options in frontend: independent toggles for frontend/game sound/music, select locale * Lua scripting for easy creation of missions and special maps. * Many bug fixes, speed optimizations, translation updates
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: * New weapons, maps, theme, visual effects, sounds, training modes * Dynamically zoom in/out in the battlefield with mouse wheel. * Updated graphics * Team chat * Remember net password * Implement room control delegation when host's connection fails * Colorize chat events in engine * Frontend improvements * Fix crash in replay caused by speech bubbles * Fix some desync causes * Fix rope bugs * Fix bugs in weapon selection code
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Update doc path, remove strict deps for 2009.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Speech Bubbles - during your turn, have your hedgehog express himself. In chat, use "regular speech" 'thought bubbles' -action bubbles- with the quote marks completely surrounding the entire typed text. You can also use /hsa /hta /hya to fire off a bubble at the moment of your attack. * New graves and hats. Animated stars in the frontend and a new theme. Add missing graphics and maps. * Two new taunts - a /shrug and /juggle -ing. * New mobster voice! A remake of the default voice set. New theme music. * New game modes. Karma, any injury you caused (not including drowning) is dealt to you too, unless invulnerable. Vampirism, where you feed off damage you deal, gaining 80% of it. Artillery, where your hog can not move about. * Options to control mine quantity and timer. Those are made use of in a Minefield scheme/weapon set as one of the default sets. * The sniper rifle demonstrated in previous news post. * Various fixes such as: prevent desync when a player quits, fix a crash at end of game in reduced quality, bug in synching changes to map and scheme in room, fix bug in disconnection from server, hedgehogs keep hats while jumping, bug in rope/parachute when drowning with active girder/teleport, bug in rope that on rare occasion deleted it on firing.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Many many more terrain generation options, maps can be huge, very small, caverns, caves, stepping stones, etc. * To accompany these new terrain generation options there are new themes and musical tracks * On top of this there are a ton of brand new preset maps, have your hogs fight on city scapes and lazy old men in hammocks! * Lots of new hats (total of 79 now!) and to add to the hats, some new voice work * A new type of weapon called a utility has been added, these weapons drop in utiltiy crates and boost your hedgehogs abilities, low gravity, laser sight, extra time, extra damage, forcefield * Alongside weaponsets we now have "scheme sets", this means you can save gameplay options into a scheme for later use. We've also added a whole load more options for you to use in your schemes, you can add borders to any map, disable mines, enable low gravity, make all hogs invincible, and more. * The server has been given a major upgrade, you can now reserve your name with your hedgewars.org account. At the moment there are no stats in game, but we may already begin tracking them to display them later, so remember to log in! We are also integrating the game with the website. * A new Despeckling gameplay feature removes stray pixels from the terrain after fires/big explosions * Graphics updates, language updates, music and sound updates across the board * Demos can now be played without the frontend * Weapons and hogs can now bounce off of the water if they hit it at the right speed/angle.. this can be used in a very interesting way with the rope ;) * Hedgewars can now generate your team for you if you're feeling lazy, it also generates random teams for "quick play" mode, and even uses appropriate hats. I.e. it will generate a ninja team, with ninja names/hats! * Changed girder functionality completely to make it a much more interesting and fun weapon! * Many more fixes and feature.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Voicepacks, customize your teams voice! * Nice new visual statistics page after the match * Precise aiming, hold shift to aim more accurately * Improved lobby chat * Remote Control Plane weapon * A couple of additions to customization content (i.e. grave / fort / hat content) * Additional sound effects * Various tweaks and bug fixes
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump : * Better menu icon * Massive number of network play bugfixes * Now spectating works for those who joined after game start * New Drill rocket weapon * New Napalm strike weapon * New Super awesome super weapon * Land can now be set to be indestructable * Six brand new maps using new themes * Lots of new forts * Hellish hand grenade reworked * Brand new lobby and lobby chat * Spread of Melon Bomb fragments improved * Blowtorch bug fixes and improvements * Fixed a crash bug that occured when the engine had no room to place all Hedgehogs * More delay after jump, less delay after small fall for hedgehog * Limit max chat message length to 300 characters * Ammo menu no longer closes when user clicks on not yet available weapon * Ammo scheme bug fixes * Fire effect improved
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Description: Geany is a small C editor using GTK+ with basic features of an integrated development environment. It features syntax highlighting, code completion, call tips, many supported filetypes (including C, Java, PHP, HTML, DocBook, Perl, LateX, and Bash), and symbol lists.

Geany, bir bütünleşik geliştirme ortamında yer alan temel özellikleri içeren basit bir GTK+ arayüzlü programlama aracıdır. Kod renklendirme, kod tamamlama, çağrı tipleri gibi özellikleri desteklmekte; birçok dosya tiplerini (C, Java, PHP, HTML, DocBook, Perl, LateX, and Bash) ve sembol listelerini içermektedir.

Update.Name: Aşkın Yollu

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Remove filetypes.common invert_all option - use 'Invert syntax highlighting colors' pref instead. - Fix 'Open Selected File' for unsaved new documents. - Fix updating main menu accelerators after changing keybindings - Fix using 'Insert date' keybinding when a custom date string has not been set. - Set the cursor color for the split window plugin. - Remove plugin from plugin manager dialog on unloading if it no longer exists or is incompatible. - Fix 'Reflow block' command when at the last paragraph and there's no last newline. - Fix opening filenames beginning with two dots (closes #2858487). - Show Find in Files stderr output in messages window instead of debug window so that invalid regex messages can be seen easily. - Speed up sorting in utils_get_file_list(). - Fix a bug with not w3c compatible HTML code on export plugin - Fix non-working Home and End keys on numpads. - Fix loading of files on network resources on Windows. - Fix wrong alignment of printed pages when page headers are disabled (closes #2856822). - Extend auto_latex() function to check whether an environment has been closed within the next lines to avoid auto adding double \end{}. - Replace some icons which could cause licensing problems by icons from the Rodent icon theme. - Parse contents of D extern{} and version{} blocks. - Fix creating D interface tags properly. - Parse D functions with contracts (fixes #1885480). - Parse D alias statement like typedef. - Improve parsing of LaTeX, PHP and Python files. - Add 'Scope autocompletion' section. - Add 'Tools menu items' section to explain configuration files submenu, reload configuration item. - Minor updates/fixes. - Added translations: gl
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Fix scrolling horizontally after finding a search match with the search bar or Find Next / Previous which is off-screen. - Remove relative / untidy path elements from filenames when opening documents. - Create initial template files with proper platform-specific line ending characters. - Improve inserting of comment templates like File header or licence notices.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Remove vte dependency, it's not required for compiling or running Geany. Thanks to Enrico. * Fix dependencies for lddtree.sh. * Update homepage URL.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: This release includes the following changes (and more!): # Added our first iteraton of an Office Open XML filter. Features supported are: formatted text, formatted paragraphs, page breaks, columns, tab stops, footnotes, endnotes, headers/footers, fields, images, hyperlinks, bookmarks, lists, tables, and text boxes. # Vastly improved LaTeX export filter, which even supports exporting equations now. # Fixed a couple of annoying crashes in the GTK frontend, for example when overwriting a file or inserting a symbol. # Fixed a bug that prevented the correct shaping of glyphs for complex scripts such as Arabic. The full changelog can be found at http://www.abisource.com/changelogs/2.6.5.phtml

Source.Name: gnumeric
Source.Description: This is the Gnumeric, the GNOME spreadsheet program. If you are familiar with Excel, you should be ready to use Gnumeric. It tries to clone all of the good features and stay as compatible as possible with Excel in terms of usability. Hopefully the bugs have been left behind.
Gnumeric, GNOME'un hesap çizelgesi uygulamasıdır. Excel kullanıcıları Gnumeric kullanmakta zorlanmazlar. Excel'in tüm iyi yönlerini ve buna ek olarak kendi üstün özelliklerini içinde barındırır.

Source.Description: GNU Ocrad is an OCR (Optical Character Recognition) program based on a feature extraction method. It reads images in pbm (bitmap), pgm (greyscale) or ppm (color) formats and produces text in byte (8-bit) or UTF-8 formats.

GNU Ocrad, belirleyici özellik seçme yöntemini temel alan bir OCR (Optik Karakter Tanıma) programıdır. Pbm (biteşlem), pgm (gri-ölçek) veya ppm (renkli) biçimleri okur; ve bayt (8-bit) veya UTF-8 biçimlerinde metin üretir.

Source.Description: Incollector is an application to collect various kinds of information (like notes, conversation logs, quotes, serial numbers, source code, web addresses, words). All the entries can be tagged, so you can find them very easily. There are also search folders which allows you to search for entries by specified criteria. You can also export (and import, of course) entries to an external file.
Incollector, kişisel bilgilerinizi toplayıp, saklayabileceğiniz basit bir bilgi saklama programıdır.

Source.Name: gcstar
Source.Description: GCstar is a free open source application for managing your collections. Detailed information on each item can be automatically retrieved from the internet and you can store additional data, such as the location or who you've lent it to. You may also search and filter your collection by many criteria.

Gcstar, koleksiyonlarınızı yönetebileceğiniz açık kaynaklı bir uygulamadır. Film, oyun, kitap ve müzik koleksiyonlarınız hakkında gerekli bilgileri internetten alabileceğiniz gibi, bazı ek bilgileri kendiniz de girebilirsiniz. Ayrıca çeşitli seçeneklerle filtreleme de yapabilirsiniz.

It covers the complete spectrum of project management tasks from the first idea to the completion of the project. It assists you during project scoping, resource assignment, cost and revenue planing, risk and communication management.

TaskJuggler, ciddi proje yöneticileri için Açık Kaynak kodlu bir proje yönetim aracıdır. Proje yönetiminde, fikrin doğuşundan projenin bitimine kadar, proje yürütücüsünün tüm ihtiyaçlarını kapsar. Proje üzerinde inceleme yaparken, kaynak atarken, maliyer ve gelir planı oluştururken ayrıca risk ve iletişim yönetiminde size yardımcı olur.

GanttProject, Java ile yazılmış bir proje zamanlama uygulamasıdır. Bunu kullanarak diyagramlarınızı yazdırabilir, PDF ve HTML olarak rapor oluşturabilir, Microsoft(R) Project(TM) ve elektronik tablolama uygulamalarıyla bilgi alışverişi yapabilirsiniz.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Remember font size. - Fix proxy authentication. - Fix creating new search folder. - Fix adding bloglines subscriptions. - Some interface betterment. - Update translations: Catalan, Dutch, Hungarian, Romanian, Slovak. * Remove empty doc files.

Update.Comment: * Stable version bump: - Revert item_set_description() to the 1.4 code since the HTML detection created too many false negatives. - Update of Swedish translation.

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Update translations: Arabic and Brazilian Portuguese. - Fix infinite loop on 404 errors. - Fix work around a format misdetection in item_set_description(). - Don't scale images when scaling the text. - Add strict webkitgtk dependency to avoid problems with older versions. - Fix subscription, new source crashes. - Reduce memory usage by only using a WebKitWebSettings for all the htmlviews. - Fix crash when quitting during download. - Fix crash when removing Google Reader node when update of one of it's subscriptions is in progress. - Open new windows opened by Javascript in a new tab. - Fixes a crash on some newsbin items without parents. - Fix targe="_blank" links not opening in tabs. - Fix work around several eggtrayicon crashes. - Open the "Decrease/Increase Text Size" menu instead of the normal link menu on JavaScript links.

Source.Name: transmission
Source.Summary: A fast, easy, and free BitTorrent client
Hızlı, basit ve özgür BitTorrent istemcisi
Source.Description: Transmission is a free, lightweight Bittorrent client. It features a simple, intuitive interface on top of an efficient backend. This package provides only daemon, web interface and command line client. If you use Transmission with graphical interface, you should install transmission-gtk or transmission-qt.

Transmission özgür ve hafif BitTorrent istemcisidir. İki değişik kitaplıkla yazılmış basit ve kullanışlı arayüz istemcisi vardır. Qt ile yazılmış arayüz paketinin adı transmission-qt, GTK+ ile yazılmış olanı ise transmission-gtk'dir. Bu pakette sadece servis, komut satırı istemcisi ve Web arayüzü bulunmaktadır.

Update.Comment:
* Version bump: All Platforms: - Fix possible data corruption issue caused by data sent by bad peers during endgame - Fix potential buffer overflow when adding maliciously-crafted magnet links - Fix announces to IPv6 trackers - Fix DNS problems on some platforms, including Debian - Fix issues with the incomplete directory functionality - Fix port forwarding error on some routers by updating libnatpmp and miniupnp
Mac: - Fix bug where setting low priority in the add window resulted in high priority
GTK+: - Fix directory selection error in GTK+ 2.19 - Small GUI improvements: HIG correctness, remove deprecated GTK+ calls, etc.
Daemon: - Fix 1.91 build error on Mac and FreeBSD - Standardize the daemon's watchdir feature to behave like the other clients'
Web Client: - Statistics dialog - Fix error in "trash data and remove from list" that didn't trash all data - Fix display of ratios and time - Update to jQuery 1.4.2 * Remove desktop.patch. Not required. It fixed on this version. * Fix actions.py for pep8. * Split transmission-web. * Update translations.xml.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: - Version bump - Fix directory traversal vulnerability that causes data loss with malicious torrent files. (CVE-2010-0012, #11935) - Remove incorrect replaces tag in transmission-gtk package
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Don't wait so long on unresponsive trackers if there are other trackers to try. - Adding corrupt/invalid torrents could crash Transmission. - Fix 1.74 bug that caused a high CPU load on startup. - Fix 1.74 bug that stopped multitracker if a single tracker sent an error message. - Fix bug in converting other charsets to UTF-8. - Handle HTTP redirects more gracefully. - Faster verification of local data for torrents with small piece size. - Fix 1.74 build error when compiling without DHT. - Fix "sort by time remaining". - Fix the turtle toggle button on old versions of GTK+. - Fix startup error if another copy of the Transmission GTK client is running. - Fix clang build issue.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Better data recovery in the case of an OS or Transmission crash. - If a data file is moved, stop the torrent instead of redownloading it. - Fix bug that didn't list some peers in the resume file and in PEX. - More helpful torrent error messages. - DHT now honors the bind-address-ipv4 configuration option. - Fix Debian build error with miniupnpc. - Fix Cygwin build error with strtold. - Update to a newer snapshot of miniupnpc.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Fix bug where user-configured peer limits could be exceeded. - Use less memory in some high-peer situations. - Better estimation of time left to download. - Support supportcrypto and requirecrypto flags in http tracker announces. - Update to newer snapshots of libnatpmp and miniupnpc. - Make DHT a compile-time option. * Enable Qt gui support. * Split package.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump. * Rewrite file paths with subdirs.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: - Version bump, - Fix desktop file, - Add notify support. - Add description tag.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Update.Comment: * Version bump * Fix localclient authentication by stripping the lines read from the auth file * Do not try to call doIteration() on the reactor if it has already stopped * Fix 'autostart localhost if needed' option * Fix starting plugins when the pluginmanager is started * Fix saving torrent state on fresh configs * Fix changing of the allocation in the preferences * Fix updating the Connection Manager when a host is added * Add a --fork option to allow forking the webui to the background * Fix the statusbar menu limits * Fix setting the torrent options via the options tab * Fix the private flag in the options tab * Fix exception when using the 'halt' command * Add new dependencies (Twisted, pyopenssl, chardet)
Update.Name: Cihan Okyay

Update.Comment: * Version bump: - Only move a torrent due to 'move on complete' when some data has been downloaded. - Update libtorrent for CVE-2009-1760. - Fix #950 renaming a parent folder into multiple folders. - Fix pause all/resume all. - Fix remote torrent add for webui. - Torrent name is now changed when the root folder or file is renamed. - Fix high cpu usage when displaying speeds in titlebar. - Fix showing non-utf8 encoded torrents in add torrent dialog -- this adds an additional dependency on chardet. - Fix exception when timing out trying to send notification email. - Set some sane defaults for peers/file tabs column widths. - Fix starting when -l option is used for webui. - Fix #883 segfault if locale is not using UTF-8 encoding. - Fix for adding torrents with invalid filename encodings. - Fix displaying IPv6 peers in the Peers tab. - Fix loading improperly created torrents with mismatched encodings. - Fix displaying improper progress when creating torrent.
Update.Name: Gökmen Görgen

Source.Name: rinetd
Source.Description: Redirects TCP connections from one IP address and port to another. rinetd is a single-process server which handles any number of connections to the address/port pairs specified in the file /etc/rinetd.conf.
IP adresi ya da portlar arası bağlantıları yönlendirmeye yarayan bir uygulamadır. /etc/rinetd.conf dosyasındaki yapılandırmalara göre adres/port yönlendirmesini uygular.

Source.Name: httrack
Source.Summary: A website copier and offline browser utility
Web sayfası kopyalayıcı ve çevrimdışı tarama aracı
Source.Description: HTTrack allows you to download a web site from the Internet to a local directory, building recursively all directories; getting HTML, images, and other files from the server to your computer. HTTrack arranges the original site's relative link-structure. Simply opening a page of the "mirrored" website in your browser, and you can browse the site from link to link, as if you were viewing it online. HTTrack can also update an existing mirrored site, and resume interrupted downloads.

HTTrack internetteki bir web sitesini bütün alt dizinleriyle birlikte bilgisayarınıza indirmenize imkan verir. İndirilen sitenin bağlantıları bilgisayarınza göre yeniden ayarlanır. İndirdiğiniz sitenin linklerine tıklayarak çevrim içiyken yaptığınız gibi dolaşabilirsiniz. HTTrack daha önce indirdiğiniz bir siteyi güncelleyebildiği gibi yarıda kalmış indirmelere de devam edebilir.

Source.Name: socat
Source.Summary: Relais de transfert de données biderctionnel à usage multiple (netcat++)
Multipurpose relay for bidirectional data transfer (netcat++)
Source.Description: Socat établi 2 flux d'octet bidirectionnel et transfert les données entre eux. Les canaux de données peuvent être des fichiers, des pipes, des péréphérioques ou des sockets. Il permet de forker, tracer et de logguer différent modes pour la communication interprocessus et bien d'autres options.

Socat establishes two bidirectional byte streams and transfers data between them. Data channels may be files, pipes, devices, or sockets (Unix, IPv4, IPv6, raw, UDP, TCP, SSL). It provides forking, logging and tracing, different modes for interprocess communication and many more options.
