Source.Name: licq
Source.Summary: Çoklu iş parçacıklı / çoklu protokol bir ICQ istemcisi
Source.Description: Licq is a multi-threaded ICQ (originally; now it supports AOL and MSN as well) clone written mostly in C++. It uses an extensive plugin system to manage many different functions.

Licq, çoğu C++ da yazılmış, çoklu iş parçacıklı bir ICQ (orjinali öyleydi; artık AOL ve MSN de destekliyor) istemcisidir. Çeşitli fonksiyonlar için kullanılan, genişleyebilen bir eklenti sistemi bulunuyor.

Package.Name: licq-msn
Package.Description: Licq MSN plugin.
Licq MSN eklentisi.

Package.Name: licq-osd
Package.Description: On Screen Display (OSD) plugin display messages on the screen transparently as soon as they are received.
Görüntü Üzerine Yazı (OSD) eklentisi gelen mesajların anında ekranda saydam olarak gözükmesini sağlar.

Package.Name: licq-rms
Package.Description: This plugin opens a TCP server on the Licq box which allows you to telnet in and perform commands and get information. It works with the new licqweb web interface. It acts much like the FIFO only it is two way. Currently it supports viewing/changing status, viewing the user list, viewing groups, sending messages/urls, and dumping the network log.

This plugin opens a TCP server on the Licq box which allows you to telnet in and perform commands and get information. It works with the new licqweb web interface. It acts much like the FIFO only it is two way. Currently it supports viewing/changing status, viewing the user list, viewing groups, sending messages/urls, and dumping the network log.

Package.Name: licq-console
Package.Description: This is a console interface plugin for Licq using ncurses. It features multiple command windows, and much of the basic icq functionality.
This is a console interface plugin for Licq using ncurses. It features multiple command windows, and much of the basic icq functionality.

Package.Name: licq-forwarder
Package.Description: A simple plugin to forward incoming ICQ events to either an email address or another ICQ account. This is great for forwarding a secondary ICQ account or forwarding to a pager/mobile phone. Also included in the main distribution.

A simple plugin to forward incoming ICQ events to either an email address or another ICQ account. This is great for forwarding a secondary ICQ account or forwarding to a pager/mobile phone. Also included in the main distribution.

Package.Name: licq-autoreply
Package.Description: Plugin to automatically respond to any incoming event with the output of a given program, which can be passed user arguments, or event the message text itself. Often used in conjunction with "fortune" to send people fortunes.

Plugin to automatically respond to any incoming event with the output of a given program, which can be passed user arguments, or event the message text itself. Often used in conjunction with "fortune" to send people fortunes.

Package.Name: licq-web
Package.Description: licqweb is a Web frontend for licq. It interfaces with the Remote Management Service plugin and uses AJAX to provide real-time communication. It is useful for people who use IMs from multiple locations and want a 'centralised' application that means no more logging off and on, consolidates chat history to the one location, and prevents problems where messages are missed because another IM client received them.

licqweb is a Web frontend for licq. It interfaces with the Remote Management Service plugin and uses AJAX to provide real-time communication. It is useful for people who use IMs from multiple locations and want a 'centralised' application that means no more logging off and on, consolidates chat history to the one location, and prevents problems where messages are missed because another IM client received them.

Update.Comment: Version bump: * Fix status icon on tray updates to the last status changed * Fix drag and drop files to chat window no longer working * Qt4-Gui: Fixed a bug that could cause GUI to crash on startup * Qt4-Gui: Fixed a bug causing the same image to be loaded for all icons * Qt4-Gui: Dragging a file to chat dialog will open send dialog * Qt4-Gui: Tray icon will show status from another protocol if ICQ is offline * RMS: Fixed a bug causing LIST command to always return an empty list * RMS: Added HISTORY command for fetching user history * Web-Gui: Corrected various syntax errors in scripts * Web-Gui: Updated html to conform with xhtml 1.1 standard * Web-Gui: Added option to set status offline * Web-Gui: Made windows resizable * Web-Gui: Show messages from history when opening chat window * Web-Gui: Highlight timestamp and user alias in chat history
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump: * GUI ported to QT4. * New tray icon handling that will work on any desktop with a standard tray area. * Various bugs in both Licq and plugins that caused crashes have been fixed. * Properly handle backslashes in auto responses. * ICQ: Use MD5 based authentication for login instead of sending plain text password. * ICQ: Support for downloading contact pictures from server. * ICQ: Line breaks in received messages from some clients were lost. * ICQ: Manually set aliases were sometimes lost during logon. * ICQ: Files were left open after canceled transfers. * MSN: Sometimes sockets were getting associated with the wrong conversation. * MSN: Fixed a problem with contact pictures sometimes failing to download. * Show contact registration date in user info dialog. * GUI will now update if group data changes. * Startup group setting moved from daemon to GUI. * Automatically switch message dialog to text message after sending file, contact, url, etc. * Birthday icon is now removed at the end of the day. * Main window position/size is now saved on exit. * User info can be opened from authorization request window. * Fixed ICQ server port resetting to default when opening options dialog. * Establishing a secure connection now unchecks "Send through server". * User info dialog now includes year in all dates. * Buttons for most dialogs are ordered to match the local environment. * Message dialog has new layout which uses less space for the controls. * Settings dialog pages has been reorganized with fewer options per page for easier navigation. * User info dialog has been extended to also include pages with user settings. * Settings dialog and user info dialog now uses a navigation-tree pane instead of tabs. * A completely new history dialog with easier navigation and search functionality. * Message dialog remember its position and size (tabbed mode only). * Option to display user image in message dialog. * Contact list shows contacts awaiting authorization in different colour. * Fixed deleting a user caused the contact list to behave strange or even crash. * Moved Qt style setting from command line to settings dialog. * Moved skin and icon set selections to settings dialog. * Alt+1, Alt+2, etc in message dialog can be used to switch between tabs. * Made keyboard shortcuts configurable. * Several additional functions can be configured to have keyboard shortcuts. * Added option to disable sound for active message window. * Size of view event and send event dialogs are remembered. * Current group in contact list can be changed using scroll wheel on message field. * Shift+PgUp/PgDn in message input can be used to scroll history area. * Added spell checking support for message dialog. * Thread contact list can be split in online and offline parts (group mode 2).
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Login fix for ICQ server policy change.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: Version bump, split some plugins, package cleanup.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Source.Name: qwit
Source.Description: This Qt4 based Twitter client can be used as a native KDE4 application.
Bu Qt4 tabanlı Twitter istemcisi bir KDE4 uygulaması gibi kullanılabilir.

Update.Comment: Update to r38 with patch. Adds Turkish and Russian translations, fixes crash bugs.
Update.Name: Uğur Çetin

Source.Name: micq
Source.Description: ICQ text-mode client with many features
Komut satırında çalışan ve birçok özelliği olan ICQ istemcisi

Source.Name: gossip
Source.Summary: Gnome için hafif bir jabber istemcisi

Update.Comment: Remove docbook-xml4_1_2 from runtime dependencies. It's only needed when building the package.
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Source.Name: xchat
Source.Description: X-chat allows you to join multiple IRC channels (chat rooms) at the same time, talk publicly, private one-on-one conversations etc. Even file transfers are possible.
X-chat birden fazla IRC kanalına (sohbet odasına) aynı anda girmenize, herkesle beraber ya da özel başbaşa konuşmalara olanak tanır. Dosya aktarımları bile mümkündür.

Update.Comment: Add package description, update Turkish summary, tidy file paths.
Update.Name: Doruk Fişek

Update.Comment: - Use g_ascii string functions to not working irc commands. - Enable shared libsexy support instead of gtkspell.
Update.Name: Burak Çalışkan

Update.Comment: Add patch to fix crash when transparent background is set.
Update.Name: Eren Türkay

Source.Name: centerim
Source.Description: ICQ, Yahoo!, MSN, AIM, IRC, Gadu-Gadu and Jabber protocols are supported. Internal RSS reader and LiveJournal client are also provided.

Source.Name: gtkterm
Source.Summary: A serial port terminal written in GTK+, similar to Windows' HyperTerminal
Windows'taki Hyperterminal'e benzeyen, GTK+ ile yazılmış bir seri port terminali
Source.Description: It is a "clone" of the famous Hyperterminal. But it is much more simple, that is to say, that it can only communicate with a serial link and that it does not support all the modem protocols. If you are searching for a more complete application of that kind that is more dedicated to be used with a modem, have a look at minicom.

Bu program ünlü Hyperterminal'in bir kopyasıdır. Fakat ondan daha basittir. Sadece seri bağlantı kurabilir ve bütün modem protokollerini desteklemez. Eğer modem protokolleriyle daha uyumlu bir program arıyorsanız minicom işinizi görecektir.

Source.Name: x11vnc
Source.Summary: A VNC server for real X displays
Source.Description: x11vnc allows one to view remotely and interact with real X displays.
x11vnc, gerçek x görünümü uzaktan izlemenizi ve etkileşimi sağlar.

Source.Name: xrdp
Source.Summary: An open source remote desktop protocol(rdp) server
Açık kaynak uzak masaüstü bağlantısı (rdp) sunucusu
Source.Description: Based on the work of rdesktop, xrdp uses the remote desktop protocol to present a GUI to the user. The goal of this project is to provide a fully functional Linux terminal server, capable of accepting connections from rdesktop and Microsoft's own terminal server / remote desktop clients. Unlike Windows NT/2000/2003/2008 server, xrdp will not display a Windows desktop but an X window desktop to the user. Xrdp uses Xvnc or X11rdp to manage the X session.

rdesktop için yapılan çalışmayı baz alan xrdp, uzak masaüstü bağlantı protokolü (rdp) kullanarak kullanıcıya grafik masaüstü ortamı göstermeyi hedefleyen bir sunucudur. Projenin hedefi, kullanıcıya rdesktop ve Microsoft'un uzak masaüstü bağlantısı istemcilerinin de bağlanabildiği, tüm masaüstü özelliklerini destekleyen bir linux uçbirimi sunmaktır. Microsoft Windows NT/2000/2003/2008 sunucularının aksine, xrdp kullancıya Windows masaüstü yerine, Xwindows masaüstü ortamı gösterecektir. Xrdp X oturumunu yönetmek için Xvnc veya X11rdp kullanır.
